# Create *shared data*

```{r eval=FALSE}
data <- readRDS("data/data.RDS")
sd <- SharedData$new(my_data)  #<<
```
--
```{r eval=FALSE}
datatable(sd) #<<
```
--
```{r eval=FALSE}
leaflet(sd) %>%  #<<
  addTiles() %>% 
  addMarkers()
```
